Reference

Modifying DESCRIPTION

Functions that make modifications to DESCRIPTOIN file for article handling

update_status() reject() reject_format() accept() withdraw()

Update the status of an article.

valid_status

A list of all valid statuses.

add_reviewer()

Add review to DESCRIPTION

decline_reviewer() agree_reviewer()

Review helper function

email_template()

Send an email template.

invite_reviewers() invite_reviewer() add_review()

Invite reviewer(s).

Editor functions

Functions to assist the Editors handle submissions

update_status() reject() reject_format() accept() withdraw()

Update the status of an article.

add_ae()

Add AE to the DESCRIPTION

Editor-in-Chief functions

Functions to assist the EiC extract new submissions, build the article folder

get_submissions()

Download submissions.

acknowledge_submission()

Send submission acknowledgements

acknowledge_submission_text()

Create an acknowledgement email in correspondence folder

acknowledge_revision()

Send revision received acknowledgement

Developed by Editor-in-Chief.
